main event: A jet plane passenger observed a bright metallic object resembling a jet while flying over eastern Kansas in 1963.
interesting points: The object was bright and metallic, resembling the fuselage and wings of a jet plane., The witness noted there were no running lights or exhaust trail., The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes before the object disappeared., The witness initially mistook reflections in the jet's double windows for a single structure., The object appeared to have a triangular shape with bright colors and accelerated to high speed.
sighted object: bright metallic object resembling a jet
witness description: passenger in a jet plane flying at 30,000 feet
